reviews.review: Не смотря на то, что в игре присутствует куча багов, Dead by Daylight - шикарный экшн, в который играть с каждым обновлением все интересней интересней! Советую всем.
Secondo me è un ottimo titolo... l'unica pecca è che dopo molto tempo di gioco stanca

The game itself is fun. When i first bought it i realised there were quite a few bugs so i thought okay they will fix those bugs. One patch after another those bugs are still not fixed despite them saying it is fixed. Funny thing is they can come up with so many new characters /items but cannot fix those bugs. I'm really disappointed SMH. I would not recommend you to buy this game until they really fix those major bugs.

我玩殺手的時候沒發生這個問題, 但玩"逃生者"時才會發生,  是否遊戲系統出現問題?

Do NOT let these mixed reviews put you off.

The developers have worked so hard to fix and change this game to suit their fans (which most devs nowadays give up on am i right?) to also add they have taken the time to LISTEN to their fans and all people do is moan and do not appreciate the time and effort they have done to add more content, fix all the bugs and add all the patches to make this game work and run better.

Buy it and try it for yourself, dont let reviews completely mask your opinions like what they do on other review platforms like tripadvisor.

А кто это там? А что это? Это дерево?Тень? А нет это опять маньяк заспавнился в 2-х метрах от тебя. Подбор рангов? Хуйня для слабоков зачем он вам вы 20-ого ранга, а маньяк 1-ого. Господи кому какая разница правда же?! Но в целом игра приятная и атмосферная. Хороший графон, приятное звуковое сопровождение. Игра явно стоит своих денег.(напрягает лишь что каждый патч докупать нужно, то есть хочешь нового маньяка плати, выжевшего плати. Хоть карты бесплатные и на том спасибо)

Отличная, захватывающая игра! 

+ Велколепная прокачка перков и душещипательный геймплей. 
+ Оптимизация на уровне.
+ Нет голосового чата.
+ Ранги выживших и маньяков.
+ Уникальная прокачка каждого персонажа.

- Боты вместо маньяков. 
- Не часто, но падаю сессии из за чего понижается ранг. 
- Наиредчайшие баги с текстурами и застреванием персонажей.

Рекомендую, разрабам моё уважение!

我其实是看来直播之后来购买这个游戏的，但是完全不符合我的预期，因为启动实在是过慢，光是打开就要等差不多3到4分钟吧，我只是按着少的说的，然后进去之后反正还好，也很好玩，但是打两到3局以后马上就会出现无限载入，这是我无法忍受的，然后又重新打开，其实我玩了两个小时，真正游戏时间可能一个小时都没有，大家购买的时候真的要三思啊，而且没有教程，没有技能，对新手真的不是很公平，队友都4个技能，蓝瘦香菇，有人可能就要说了，根本没有你这样的评论嘛，你没几个游戏，就来评论，是不是水军，是假的，加特技的，这就很尴尬很冤枉了，这个号是新号，我原来的号因为在dota2里买了太多饰品被盗了，申请回来过了没多久又被盗了，希望我的经历对各位想入又在犹豫的dalao有帮助
다 좋은데 방 매치가 잘 안 되고, 웨이팅 시간이 너무 기네요. 한글화 없이도 플레이 자체에 큰 불편함은 없으나 퍽이나 아이템 설명이 복잡한 편이라 내용이 좀 간촐해진다면 좋겠네요. 덧붙여 등급 초기화는 맘에 안 듦. 애써 올려놨더니 시즌 끝났다며 도로 떨어지니.

I've been playing this game since November 2016, A legacy player. I have over 3.000 hours in this game and despite my recurring addictions to it, try to not pay for this game's content as much as possible.

The game director for this game recommends you go play other games if you have any complaints about this one. It's pretty telling of how awful the game is. If you're new and interested in it, I really want to warn you away. The community is incredibly toxic, the game play is incredibly frustrating at times, and the developers are evidently only interested in milking it's popularity for profit.

So, so many design and implementation choices are questionable at best, and horribly buggy at worst. Don't buy this game. I pray for the day this giant falls and a new asymmetric game takes its place. Hopefully then the player base would be in better hands and not at each other's throats.
LAGGING SO HARD. THIS GAME HAS SERIOUS PROBLEM!!!

The last six rounds I did were all bot killer games so I'm done, if there is a way to report poeple for this I couldn't recomend this anymore but at the moment you are more than likely going to be in matches with poeple who power leveled. Also either the match making is fucked to begin with or them doing that has fucked the match making, I picked this up a few weeks ago and have been in one to two matches with other poeple with only one perk, every one else has four.

Dead by Daylight macht zweifelsohne Spaß, aber das Spiel kommt leider sehr....hakelig und buggy daher.
Es ist als hätte dieses Spiel jemand schlecht programmiert/designed.
Auch das Balancing und Match-Making ist so schlimm wie man es sich nur vorstellen kann.

Überall über die Maps sind Clipping-Fehler zu finden, weswegen man sich gerne an Kanten im Boden oder an Steinen aufhängt. Erinnert mich ein bisschen an "The Forest".
Manche Killer/Survivor Perks sind absolut mächtig und andere unglaublich nutzlos. Sodass quasi jeder mit Sprintboost, Eiserner Griff, Niemand entrinnt dem Tod, Adrenalin, Saboteur etc. durch die Gegend läuft.

Fallensteller / Michael Jacks- äh Myers sind der absolute Top Trend aktuell. Einer ist sogar noch Pay2Play...meh. (1/3 des gesamten Spielpreises nochmal oben drauf für einen einzigen Killer+Survivor - läuft - zumindest in der Kasse!)
Die kürzlichen Patches haben ebend dies nochmal verschlimmert. Früher konnte man einen Survivor vom Haken holen, und trat danach in die Falle konnte aber vom "Enthakten" direkt befreit werden. Das kostete zwar Zeit und Blut aber es war möglich. Nun cancelt die Falle aber die Enthak-Aktion. An sich wäre das ein schlichter Buff für den Fallensteller, aber das Problem ist: Viele Survivor die nun logischerweise erst versuchen die Falle zu entschärfen und denn zu enthaken, können dies ganz einfach nicht tun, da beides vom selben Bottun ausgelöst wird. Folglich darf man sekundenlang rumprobieren, bis die Falle sich anbietet als Aktion. Das ist in einem Spiel indem es bei sowas um Bruchteile von Sekunden geht äußerst....bescheuert.

Da kommen wir gleich zum nächsten Punkt: Camper! Wir alle kennen und lieben sie NICHT!
Als Killer beim aufgehakten Survivor zu campen ist Standard, und leider auch äußerst erfolgreich, obendrein ist es sehr kontraproduktiv für das Gameplay. Die Mitspieler versuchen meist garnicht erst andere zu retten, in der Annahme: Er wird sowieso dort Campen - Teamwork? Ade!
Wenn es doch jemand versucht, so gibt es einfach einen Survivor der für kurze Zeit keinen Generator bearbeitet. Vorteil für den Freund des Campings!
Das geht inzwischen soweit, dass ich Survivor sehe, die nicht becampt werden, aber nicht gerettet werden, einfach weil die Annahme trotzdem besteht. Verdient, denn auf 9 /10 Killer trifft das zu. Dafür blamen kann man die Spieler nicht, es funktioniert ja. Das nichts dagegen getan wird, dass ist das eigentliche Problem.

Selbiges Problem bestand vor einigen Wochen noch bei den Paletten und Fenstern über die die Survivor hüpfen können...immer und immer wieder! Und es funktionierte und die Killer waren entbrannt vor Wut, warum die Survivor solche billigen Tricks verwenden. Auch hier gilt: Was funktioniert ist erlaubt!
Aber um dieses Problem wurde sich ja immerhin gekümmert.

Noch mehr? Ohja!
Killer bekommen deutlich leichter Blutpunkte, und können dadurch wesentlich leichter ihren Rang verbessern.
Es kann vorkommen, dass ein Killer von 4 Leuten nicht einen killt, und bekommt trotzdem 10.000 Punkte und damit einen Pip.
Es lohnt sich also Killer zu spielen, um denn die verdienten Punkte bei Survivor XYZ zubenutzen.
Leider ist das Killer-Gameplay sehr viel langweiliger als das Spielen des Überlebenden, darum besteht akuter Mangel von Killern. Beachtlich, wenn man überlegt, dass auf 4 Überlebende nur 1 Killer angesetzt wird.
Hierbei kommt es mit dem legendären Matchmaking sogar gelegentlich dazu, dass 4 Survivor auf Rang 20 mit einem Killer auf Rang 1 verkuppelt werden. Diese brauchen oft nicht mal Perks ausrüsten, und rasieren ihre Gegner trotzdem mühelos.

Nun mal zusammengefasst.

Pro:
- sehr spaßiges Gameplay, vorallen mit Freunden
- Grafik zwar nicht topaktuell, aber trotzdem bringt es Atmosphäre
- Große Auswahl an verschiedenen Items, Add-Ons, Perks, Opfergaben
- Charakter ist personalisierbar

Neutral:
- Auswahl von Überlebenden und Killern ist eher Mau
- Kartenauswahl ist noch relativ gering

Contra:
- ziemlich buggy
- sehr unbalanced
- Matchmaking ist nicht existent
- Teile der Kleidung oder spielbare Charaktere sind nur als DLC erwerblich, obwohl es am Spiel selbst noch ungemein viel zu verbessern gibt
- während sich Killer in ihrer Sekundärwaffe unterschieden, sind die Survivor identisch, bis auf 3 spezifische Perks
- Gelegentliche Abstürze
- Killermangel von Zeit zu Zeit
- Unter Umständen enorm lange Wartezeiten bis eine Lobby gefunden wird

Un gioco bellissimo che sta migliorando con il tempo. Quando lo acquistai era pieno di bug (che tutt'ora ci sono ma in minor quantità) e il matchmaking (come la pensano tutti) era molto lento, addirittura con tempi superiori ai 30 minuti.
Basti pensare che ora (se siete due giocatori) la partita parte quasi sempre immediatamente, e non si aspettano più di 5 minuti (salvo rari casi).
Parlando del gioco, beh, non ha sicuramente una trama ben definita, è un gioco interamente online dove si può scegliere di giocare "sopravvissuto" quindi colui che deve attivare dei generatori sparsi in giro per la mappa, o in alternativa , si può giocare come "killer" ovvero devi rendere la vita difficile a questi sopravvissuti andando in giro a zappare peggio di un contadino.
In finale, c'è da dire che l'atmosfera horror è ben riuscita, anche solo sentendo i battiti (che indicano la vicinanza tra te, e il killer) può far venire la pelle d'oca in pochissimi secondi.
Il resto lo scoprirete voi, e spero che in futuro migliorerà ancora, perchè è un gioco promettente.

All in all, the game concept is pretty fun. Deliver a good hunt as a killer or (don't) risk your life for your friends or strangers as a survivor. A skilled killer combined with good teamwork among the survivors can create a very tense game that makes you smash that spectate button immediately after dying, cheering for your mates.

Unfortunately, the game experience can be ruined e.g. by camping killers which take away the challenge of getting out alive as a survivor - if you or a team mate get camped hard, there is not much you can do except for rushing through the game. This spoils the tension of sneaky hiding (that moment when the killer walks right past you...) as well as escaping the killer or rescuing your hooked / downed teammates.

The devs are more and more adressing greater issues like matchmaking. Unlike in the past, waiting times in order to find a game are not much of a problem by now as well as imbalances in the matched players' ranks. On the other hand, some bugs are merely replaced by new ones. I'm loving the new content but in some cases, I would also like previously released content to be extended before delivering new one. For example, further DLC-map variations: There is only one asylum and Haddonfield map whereas other locations offer more variations.
Overall, the DBD-team is working on giving us a better game experience, so I recommend getting the game.

Если вы любитель классических слешеров в духе пятницы 13,хеллоуин и тд,эта игра точно для вас.Отдельного внимания заслуживают убийцы,каждый из которых является своеобразной отсылкой к убийцам из слешеров,тут вам и кивок в сторону техаской резней бензопилой и майкл майерс добавленный кстати на хеллоуин и убийцы на сверхестественную тематику.
Концепция-популярный нынче ассимитричный мультиплеер 4 против одного,причем в отличии от того же Evolve реализован он интересно и опыт поистине уникальный за каждую сторону,реализован геймплей к слову по принципу травоядных и хищников,тоесть выжившие имеют лучший обзор и способны прятаться,а убийцы расчитаны на преследованиеи самое главное ощущения абсолютно разные,не малую роль в формировании которых играет роль саундтрек.Место в игре найдется как любителям поиграть вместе с друзьями в команде,так и одиночкам которые предпочитают полагаться только на себя. Прибавьте суда постоянные балансные правки и новый контент а так же регулярное общение разработчиков с игроками посредством еженедльных стримов на твиче с ответами на вопросы и вы получите отличную игру,рекомендую любителям слешеров и тем кому нравятся игры с сильным соревновательным потенциалом.Рекомендую

The idea of this game is awesome but god damn does is this game garbage. The ONLY way you can have fun playing this game is to either play a custom game with friends or play as a killer. Playing as a survivor is basically the worst unless the killer is terrible. Most of the time you are grouped with a high ranked killer with OP perks. Making you usless. 

I tried playing it for multiple hours but after having to wait about 10- 20 minutes waiting for a game to start, which has been a problem from the beggining; then starting a game right next to the killer, then having him camp until I die, it makes this game frustrating and unplayable. I dont want to have to wait so long for a game for it to finish in 5 minutes! I understand people may say "Get gud", but if you're playing againt Micheal Myers, who is COMPLETELY broken, then you're basically screwed. 

I just wish they did something about the camping, wait times, survivor weakness, and just overall gameplay. I reccomend you play this game for 2 hours then getting a refund

This game used to be a lot of fun until recently and here are a few problems that I've noticed, (1). The new hunter "The Shade" is faster than the other hunters and is way to op, this is imparitive and needs to change immediately. (2). The new map that came with the halloween dlc is small which is fine but they put the same amount of hooks from the other maps in the small map, this makes it very hard to not get caught by the hunter. (3). I've noticed that hunters ranging from rank 1 - rank 20 have been camping the runners when on the hooks, this is making the game not fun anymore. when the hunters are camping they should have a penalty to some degree. (4). The hunters that camp and hook the last person want to get rid of "Survive with Friends" .  If this happens then it will almost make the game impossible to play with friends. Please do not get rid of Survive With Friends.

Until these changes are met I cannot recommend this game.

An amazingly fun game, played loads of matches as both killer and survivor and IN MY OWN OPINION I feel like the killer has more favor than the surviviors. But without getting way into details about that let me tell you that this game is REALLY fun when you're paired up with some friends. The lack of in-game communication while in game as a survivor has it's ups and downs, but that sometimes makes the games much more intense. The characters are also really lovable,  giving each character more of a role based gameplay at the EARLY GAME (such as healers, saboteurers and so on) with character speciffic perks is a good thing but in the late game you've probably unlocked all of the perks so that the other survivors can use them aswell. Making the characters role based early on gives the player a chance to easily learn the basics and what each character specifies itself as, and each character has their own individual progression so you could be max level on one survivior whilst being level 1 on another. Each character also has their own individual "storage" meaning that items are saved on the characters instead of the account (same as the levels) so that you may have different items on different survivors. Before the match you create a loadout of items and addons aswell as perks and offerings to bring into the fog, these all affect how the match is going to play out and where having different locations each having a connection with the killers. Items, perks and offerings can be obtained from the progression system but you could also find an item during the match and if you successfully escape with it adds it to that characters "storage".  And for the killers it's basically the same, with each killer having different abilities (aswell as perks) makes for some diverse gameplay. HIGHLY RECCOMEND THIS GAME. I fell in love with it during the beta phase and I have never lost any passion for it, this game is great for playing alone but even better when playing with friends! And tip number one as a killer, don't camp. Just don't...

So after awhile of this game I have to say I enjoy it for two aspects: Having friends to survive with and being an  overpowered killer. The first aspect is said very lightly in terms of enjoying it  because that can easily be broken. The lagswitching, abuse and issues in this game especially hitreg turn this from being remotely fun to a complete disaster. I play the game as a killer main but also only really because I already bought it so might as well play it. It is enjoyable in short bursts but thinking this game is a good job or anything of a finished product is a far fetched dream. It has its moments of fun if you like playing your movie killers/ survivors then by all means get the game and DLC on sale but be prepared for the issues that will come alongside it and the long grind you will have to endure. I don't recommend this game for new people because it is not for casual players looking to "win" its just moreso you tried. There is no reward for high ranks or playing for a long time. Essentially its just putting out the next overpowered killer and squashing bugs at a snail's pace. Actually i think a snail can code and bug squash faster than they can. All they do is spend time saying how much of a good job they do with this game and circlejerking over this "finished " product.

The concept of this game is fun, but it's technical shortcomings make it an unplayable when trying to play with your friends. The lobby system is straight up broken. 8k active people playing the game right now, and my group of 2 other friends and myself have been queued for 25 minutes. That's just unacceptable. This isn't a new problem either, the game has had lobby issues since release, and the devs have either been unable or unwilling to fix them. It's a shame because it really does break what otherwise would be a relatively fun albeit flawed game. 
Other criticisms incluce:
- A completely unecessary and immersion breaking ranking system which encourages people to exploit, play selfishly, and otherwise ruins the tension of the experience.
- Numerous graphical and performance bugs which cause frame rate dips, rubber banding, teleporting, and getting stuck on invisible terrain. 
- All servers are listen servers hosted by the killer, no dedicated servers.
- No server browser (forces you to use broken lobby system)

Really fun game, the devs makes everything to keep it going with new perks,killers, survivors etc etc.You can play solo as a killer if you dont have friends to play with or you could team up with friends and gen rush lmao.

2016/11/21現在の個人的な感想です。

生存者でプレイした際の鬼から隠れうまくやりすごし脱出した時の達成感。

殺人鬼でプレイした際の生存者をうまく捕まえ一網打尽にした時の達成感は
なかなか他のゲームでは味わえないかと思います。

自身はこのゲームにどっぷりハマッてしまいました。


しかし、現在残念な点がいくつか出てきてしまっています。


■レベルが上がりづらい※後日緩和される模様

レベルが上がりづらいため、パーク(特殊能力)がたくさん揃っているプレイヤーを相手にすると
あまり楽しくない思いをしてしまうかもしれません。

しかし、近日行われるアップデートでレベルアップが緩和され、
キャラクターを成長させやすくなるようです。

こちらは期待して待ちましょう。

■窓ハメが横行している

窓ハメとは、一定のルートで逃げると鬼が絶対に生存者を
捕らえることができないルートがあり、そこを周回し時間を稼ぐ行為です。

この行為の最大の問題点は捕まえられないことよりもそれによって
生存者が取れる行動に大きすぎる程に余裕が生まれてしまうことです。

※具体的には一人が窓ハメで囮になっている間に
フック(生存者を最終的に吊るしておく場所)が破壊されつくされ、
殺人鬼側の装備が甘いとほぼ詰み状態になってしまうことも…

これにより一部では
「窓ハメされたくなければトラッパーかナース使え」
と言われる始末。

他の殺人鬼を育てていた人にとってはあんまりな現状じゃないでしょうか。


■最高ランク帯になると生存者がガン有利。

このゲームの最大の汚点となっている部分かと思われます。

上級者になると下記のパークを装備しているプレイヤーで固められてしまっています。

・Sprint Burst
移動速度を50%増加する(ただし3秒間のみ)

・Decisive Strike
殺人鬼に担がれた直後、
担ぎ状態から抜け出し、殺人鬼を5秒間スタンさせる
ただし、1ゲーム中に一回だけしかできない。


これは上記の窓ハメとの組み合わせもあって最悪な組み合わせのパークになっています。


必死に窓ハメする生存者を追いかけ、
やっとのことで2回攻撃を当て担ぎ上げたら逃げられる＋5秒間なにもできなくなる。


このパターンに入るともう殺人鬼側は手遅れです、発電機は9割方回されてしまい
入り口で煽ってくるプレイヤーに一回攻撃を入れて経験地を回収するという、
なんとも切ない状態になっています。

上記も相まって殺人鬼側もキャンプ(吊り上げた生存者の目の前で待つ)しか
良い手が取れず、互いにとってあまり面白くないプレイングになり、
ポイントも稼げないで終わるといったパターンもたくさんあります。



■総括
現状、殺人鬼側も生存者側も、
パークが集まり始めたほどの中ランク帯が、
一番楽しくゲームがプレイではないかと思いました。

最高ランク帯の殺人鬼にあまり人権はない状態になっています。

今後のアプデで殺人鬼側が発電機を攻撃できるようになったりするようで、、、
殺人鬼側で取れる行動がもっと増えれば変わって行きそうな予感はします。

今後に期待です。
